description.zh-cn: 中国大陆企业家，阿里巴巴集团、淘宝网、支付宝的创始人。曾任阿里巴巴集团董事局主席，是中国共产党党员。
description.en: A mainland Chinese entrepreneur, founder of Alibaba Group, Taobao, and Alipay. He is the former executive chairman of Alibaba Group and a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 一家由马云创立的中国跨国科技公司，专注于电子商务、零售、互联网和技术。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology company founded by Jack Ma, specializing in e-commerce, retail, Internet, and technology.

description.zh-cn: 马云的妻子，在杭州师范学院读书时与马云相识。
description.en: Jack Ma's wife, whom he met while studying at Hangzhou Normal College.

description.zh-cn: 马云与张瑛的儿子。
description.en: Son of Jack Ma and Zhang Ying.

description.zh-cn: 马云与张瑛的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Jack Ma and Zhang Ying.

description.zh-cn: 马云的父亲，浙江省一家戏剧协会负责人。
description.en: Jack Ma's father, head of a drama association in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 马云的母亲。
description.en: Jack Ma's mother.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省杭州市的一所公立大学，马云的母校。
description.en: A public university in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China, and Jack Ma's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由马云创立的中国在线购物平台。
description.en: A Chinese online shopping platform founded by Jack Ma.

description.zh-cn: 由马云创立的中国第三方移动和在线支付平台。
description.en: A Chinese third-party mobile and online payment platform founded by Jack Ma.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团的关联公司，旗下拥有中国最大的数字支付平台支付宝。
description.en: An affiliate company of Alibaba Group, which owns Alipay, China's largest digital payment platform.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省杭州市的一所大学，马云曾在此从事英语教学工作。
description.en: A university in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China, where Jack Ma once worked as an English teacher.

description.zh-cn: 马云的创业伙伴，共同创办了网站“中国黄页”。
description.en: Jack Ma's business partner, with whom he co-founded the website 'China Pages'.

description.zh-cn: 由马云和何一兵等人于1995年创办的网站，专为中国公司制作网页。
description.en: A website founded in 1995 by Jack Ma, He Yibing, and others, which specialized in creating webpages for Chinese companies.

description.zh-cn: 美国第45任总统，曾与马云会面讨论就业问题。
description.en: The 45th President of the United States, who met with Jack Ma to discuss job creation.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚前首相，其提出的“多媒体超级走廊”启发了马云。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Malaysia, whose 'Multimedia Super Corridor' initiative inspired Jack Ma.

description.zh-cn: 由马来西亚前首相马哈迪·莫哈末推动的一项计划，旨在促进该国的科技发展。
description.en: An initiative promoted by former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad to foster technological development in the country.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，据报道曾亲自下令阻止蚂蚁集团的首次公开募股。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, who reportedly personally ordered the halt of Ant Group's IPO.

nodes.id: 蚂蚁集团首次公开募股

zh-cn: 蚂蚁集团首次公开募股

description.zh-cn: 蚂蚁集团原计划于2020年11月进行的首次公开募股，但在上市前夕被监管机构叫停。
description.en: Ant Group's planned initial public offering in November 2020, which was suspended by regulators on the eve of its listing.

nodes.id: 第二届外滩金融峰会演讲

zh-cn: 第二届外滩金融峰会演讲

description.zh-cn: 2020年10月24日，马云在第二届外滩金融峰会上的演讲，其中公开批评了中国的金融监管体系。该演讲被认为是导致蚂蚁集团IPO被叫停的直接原因之一。
description.en: Jack Ma's speech at the Second Bund Financial Summit on October 24, 2020, in which he publicly criticized China's financial regulatory system. The speech is considered one of the direct causes for the suspension of Ant Group's IPO.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理，据报道曾说服马云回国。
description.en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who reportedly persuaded Jack Ma to return to China.

description.zh-cn: 国际功夫巨星，与马云联合创办太极禅苑，并共同出演电影《功守道》。
description.en: International kung fu star, who co-founded Taijizen with Jack Ma and co-starred with him in the film 'Gong Shou Dao'.

description.zh-cn: 由马云和李连杰联合创办，旨在推广太极文化。
description.en: Co-founded by Jack Ma and Jet Li to promote Tai Chi culture.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团在中国电子商务领域的主要竞争对手之一。
description.en: One of Alibaba Group's main competitors in the Chinese e-commerce sector.

description.zh-cn: 指一种在中国部分公司实行，从早上9点上班，晚上9点下班，每周工作6天的工作制度。马云曾对此发表争议性言论。
description.en: Refers to a work schedule practiced by some companies in China, which starts at 9:00 a.m. and ends at 9:00 p.m., 6 days a week. Jack Ma made controversial remarks about it.

description.zh-cn: 中国江西萍乡的一位气功师，马云曾前往拜访，引发社会关注。
description.en: A qigong master from Pingxiang, Jiangxi, China, whom Jack Ma visited, drawing public attention.

description.zh-cn: 2020年11月2日，中国四大金融监管机构对蚂蚁集团的实际控制人马云及高管进行了监管约谈。
description.en: On November 2, 2020, China's four major financial regulators held a supervisory meeting with Ant Group's actual controller Jack Ma and its executives.

nodes.id: 中国银行保险监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 中国银行保险监督管理委员会
en: China Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission

nodes.id: 中国证券监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 中国证券监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 蚂蚁集团董事长，曾与马云一同被中国金融监管机构约谈。
description.en: Chairman of Ant Group, who was summoned for a regulatory meeting by Chinese financial regulators along with Jack Ma.

description.zh-cn: 时任蚂蚁集团总裁，曾与马云一同被中国金融监管机构约谈。
description.en: Then-CEO of Ant Group, who was summoned for a regulatory meeting by Chinese financial regulators along with Jack Ma.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省省会，马云的出生地及阿里巴巴集团总部所在地。
description.en: The capital of Zhejiang Province, Jack Ma's birthplace and the headquarters of Alibaba Group.

nodes.id: 加利福尼亚大学柏克莱分校

zh-cn: 加利福尼亚大学柏克莱分校

description.zh-cn: 腾讯公司主要创办人之一，与马云在中国互联网行业并称为“二马”，是主要的竞争对手。
description.en: Co-founder of Tencent, known together with Jack Ma as the 'Two Mas' in China's internet industry, and a major competitor.

description.zh-cn: 马云与张瑛为夫妻关系。
description.en: Jack Ma and Zhang Ying are husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 马元坤是马云的儿子。
description.en: Ma Yuankun is the son of Jack Ma.

description.zh-cn: 马雪是马云的女儿。
description.en: Ma Xue is the daughter of Jack Ma.

description.zh-cn: 马云是马来法的儿子。
description.en: Jack Ma is the son of Ma Laifa.

description.zh-cn: 马云是崔文彩的儿子。
description.en: Jack Ma is the son of Cui Wencai.

description.zh-cn: 马云出生于浙江省杭州市。
description.en: Jack Ma was born in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 马云于1988年毕业于杭州师范学院（现杭州师范大学）外语系，获英语学士学位。
description.en: Jack Ma graduated from the Foreign Languages Department of Hangzhou Normal College (now Hangzhou Normal University) in 1988 with a Bachelor of Arts in English.

position.zh-cn: 英语教师、外事办公室主任
position.en: English Teacher, Director of Foreign Affairs Office

description.zh-cn: 马云毕业后在杭州电子工业学院（现杭州电子科技大学）从事英语教学工作，后调任外事办公室主任，于1995年辞职。
description.en: After graduation, Jack Ma worked as an English teacher at Hangzhou Institute of Electronic Engineering (now Hangzhou Dianzi University), was later appointed Director of the Foreign Affairs Office, and resigned in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 马云是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Jack Ma is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，马云辞去公职，创办了阿里巴巴网站。
description.en: In 1999, Jack Ma resigned from his public post and founded the Alibaba website.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，马云秘密成立了淘宝网。
description.en: In 2003, Jack Ma secretly founded Taobao.

description.zh-cn: 2004年，马云创立了独立的第三方电子支付平台支付宝。
description.en: In 2004, Jack Ma founded the independent third-party electronic payment platform Alipay.

description.zh-cn: 马云曾长期担任阿里巴巴集团董事局主席，直至2019年9月10日卸任。
description.en: Jack Ma served as the Executive Chairman of Alibaba Group for a long period until he stepped down on September 10, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 马云与何一兵是创业伙伴，于1995年共同创办了网站“中国黄页”。
description.en: Jack Ma and He Yibing were business partners who co-founded the website 'China Pages' in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 1995年4月，马云与妻子及何一兵等人共同创办了“中国黄页”网站。
description.en: In April 1995, Jack Ma, along with his wife, He Yibing, and others, co-founded the 'China Pages' website.

description.zh-cn: 1995年4月，何一兵与马云等人共同创办了“中国黄页”网站。
description.en: In April 1995, He Yibing, along with Jack Ma and others, co-founded the 'China Pages' website.

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月9日，马云与时任美国候任总统特朗普在纽约会谈，讨论了阿里巴巴如何帮助创造美国就业机会。
description.en: On January 9, 2017, Jack Ma met with then-U.S. President-elect Donald Trump in New York to discuss how Alibaba could help create jobs in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 马云表示，他在1997年看到时任马来西亚首相马哈迪提出的“多媒体超级走廊”想法后，受到了启发，最终创立了阿里巴巴集团。
description.en: Jack Ma stated that after seeing the 'Multimedia Super Corridor' idea proposed by then-Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad in 1997, he was inspired to eventually found Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 2018年6月，马云访问马来西亚并与时任首相马哈迪会面。
description.en: In June 2018, Jack Ma visited Malaysia and met with then-Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad.

relationships.target: 第二届外滩金融峰会演讲

description.zh-cn: 马云在第二届外滩金融峰会上发表演讲，公开批评中国金融监管体系。
description.en: Jack Ma delivered a speech at the Second Bund Financial Summit, publicly criticizing China's financial regulatory system.

relationships.source: 第二届外滩金融峰会演讲
relationships.target: 蚂蚁集团首次公开募股

description.zh-cn: 马云在第二届外滩金融峰会上的争议性演讲被认为是导致蚂蚁集团上市计划被监管机构叫停的直接原因之一。
description.en: Jack Ma's controversial speech at the Second Bund Financial Summit is considered one of the direct reasons that led to the suspension of Ant Group's IPO by regulators.

relationships.target: 蚂蚁集团首次公开募股

description.zh-cn: 据《华尔街日报》报道，中共中央总书记习近平在马云发表外滩金融峰会演讲后，亲自下令阻止蚂蚁集团的IPO。
description.en: According to The Wall Street Journal, CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping personally ordered the halt of Ant Group's IPO after Jack Ma's speech at the Bund Financial Summit.

description.zh-cn: 据《经济学人》报道，时任国务院总理李强说服马云于2023年3月回国。
description.en: According to The Economist, then-Premier Li Qiang persuaded Jack Ma to return to China in March 2023.

description.zh-cn: 2025年2月17日，马云在北京参加了由中共中央总书记习近平出席的民营企业座谈会。
description.en: On February 17, 2025, Jack Ma attended a symposium for private enterprises in Beijing, which was also attended by CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 马云与李连杰联合创办了太极禅苑。
description.en: Jack Ma and Jet Li co-founded Taijizen.

description.zh-cn: 李连杰与马云联合创办了太极禅苑。
description.en: Jet Li and Jack Ma co-founded Taijizen.

description.zh-cn: 马云与李连杰是商业伙伴和朋友，共同创办了太极禅苑并合作拍摄电影。
description.en: Jack Ma and Jet Li are business partners and friends, having co-founded Taijizen and collaborated on a film.

description.zh-cn: 2011年，马云在未获董事会通过的情况下，决定终止支付宝与阿里巴巴集团之间的协议控制关系，对集团投资者造成冲击。
description.en: In 2011, without board approval, Jack Ma decided to terminate the VIE control agreement between Alipay and Alibaba Group, which impacted the group's investors.

description.zh-cn: 2015年1月，马云公开评论称京东的模式存在巨大问题，将来会成为悲剧，引发争议后致歉。
description.en: In January 2015, Jack Ma publicly commented that JD.com's model had huge problems and would become a tragedy in the future, apologizing after the remarks caused controversy.

description.zh-cn: 2019年4月，马云在内部交流中肯定996工作制，称其为“修来的福报”，引发社会广泛争议。
description.en: In April 2019, Jack Ma endorsed the 996 work culture in an internal meeting, calling it a 'huge blessing', which sparked widespread public controversy.

description.zh-cn: 马云曾拜访气功师王林，照片曝光后引发网络热议。
description.en: Jack Ma once visited qigong master Wang Lin, and photos of the visit sparked heated discussion online.

description.zh-cn: 作为蚂蚁集团的实际控制人，马云被中国四大金融监管机构进行监管约谈。
description.en: As the actual controller of Ant Group, Jack Ma was summoned for a supervisory meeting by China's four major financial regulators.

description.zh-cn: 作为蚂蚁集团的董事长，井贤栋被中国四大金融监管机构进行监管约谈。
description.en: As the Chairman of Ant Group, Eric Jing was summoned for a supervisory meeting by China's four major financial regulators.

description.zh-cn: 作为时任蚂蚁集团的总裁，胡晓明被中国四大金融监管机构进行监管约谈。
description.en: As the then-CEO of Ant Group, Simon Hu was summoned for a supervisory meeting by China's four major financial regulators.

relationships.source: 中国银行保险监督管理委员会
中国证券监督管理委员会

relationships.target: 加利福尼亚大学柏克莱分校

description.zh-cn: 马云的儿子马元坤就读于加利福尼亚大学伯克利分校天体物理系。
description.en: Jack Ma's son, Ma Yuankun, studied in the Department of Astrophysics at the University of California, Berkeley.

description.zh-cn: 马云与腾讯创始人马化腾在中国互联网行业并称为“二马”，是主要的商业竞争对手。
description.en: Jack Ma and Tencent founder Ma Huateng are known as the 'Two Mas' in China's internet industry and are major business competitors.
